description:
Nikita may be coming to an end, but Devon Sawa has another exciting role to look forward to: dad!《尼基塔》最后一季正在播出，不过Devon Sawa很快就会扮演一个新角色了，那就是：爸爸！

The actor and his wife, Dawni, are expecting their first child together. His rep tells E! News that the couple is having a boy who is due the first week of January.这位男演员和妻子Dawni很快就要迎来他们第一个孩子。他的经纪人向E! News透露，他们的孩子预产期在2014年1月的第一个周末。

An avid tweeter, Sawa was the first to reveal there was a new addition on the way via social media, when he posted a picture of a white crib on Monday.作为一个Twtter控，周一的时候，Sawa选择在社交媒体上公开自家添丁的消息，同时还附上了一张照片。

Prior to Nikita, which wraps it's four-season run this month, Sawa is known for his big-screen roles in films like Final Destination and Now and Then.在Sawa孩子出生之前，《尼基塔》将会在本月结束该剧的第四季，Sawa之前因为出演电影《死神来了》和《Now and Then》为观众所熟知。

title: 《尼基塔》Owen演员快要当爸爸啦
